snippet: A Senate bill to punish countries that manipulate their currencies is a bad idea. If Beijing retaliates, it could damage the American economy further.
lead_paragraph: A Senate bill to punish countries that manipulate their currencies is a bad idea. If Beijing retaliates, it could damage the American economy further.

headline.main: The Wrong Way to Deal With China
headline.print_headline: The Wrong Way to Deal With China: Talk of payback may play well politically, but it is dangerous for the economy
headline.seo: The Wrong Way to Deal With China
